thread.title: Anna Z.

author: Anna Z.
title: Anna Z.
text: Perfect mats for gym, yoga studio martial arts or as a play area for kids. Amazing quality these have been used and abused by many people including two cats that use it to scratch after severe abuse they are still just as good as ever! It's been nearly 3 years and they're still going strong ! We just ordered more for a bigger place. thank you so much for making these available at such a great price!
